text: Antonio La Forgia (24 December 1944 – 10 June 2022) was an Italian politician. He was born in Forlì, Italy. From 1996 to 1999, he was president of Emilia- Romagna and of the Emilia-Romagna Legislative Assembly from 2000 to 2005. From 2006 to 2013, he was deputy. He was a member of the Democratic Party. La Forgia died in Bologna, Italy on 10 June 2022 at the age of 77.Ex presidente E-R La Forgia morto, dopo sedazione profonda ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Emilia-Romagna
title: Antonio La Forgia
